name: Jump! Jump! (jl0814)
description:
Created By Justin Lo and Catherine Choi

The single player character will jump through obstacles, explore unknown regions, and attempt to reach his home above the undercity. The player will explore all of these elements in a single level, carefully making every step. One wrong step and you may fall back to square one. Carefully navigate the ocean, the undercity, and other regions in this exciting platformer!

Use WASD to navigate and move the character. Follow the arrows to get to the goal!
